message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9500. I think this is a fair compromise considering its value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $9000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $9800. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the last offer, so I'll counter with $9400. I think this is a fair price that works for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $9400. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $9600. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9200 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.
